"Isha Yoga is not just a practice – it is a living phenomenon. When you do it like an offering, it changes the very fundamentals of who you are!" - Sadhguru

Welcome to Isha Singapore!

Congratulations on completing the recent Inner Engineering program, we hope you are enjoying your Shambhavi.

If you wish to contact the Inner Engineering teachers who coordinate the Asia-Pacific region directly, you can email to singapore@ishayoga.org.

Monthly Sathsang (Group Meditation)
 

We conduct monthly group meditation sessions for those initiated into Shambhavi. It is an opportunity to reconnect with your kriya with Sadhguru guiding you through the Shambhavi practice. You can also get your kriya corrected by trained Isha volunteers and enjoy lovely guided meditations and exclusive videos screened at the sessions.

Date & Time: Saturday, 6 August '16 - 6:00pm to 8:30pm
Venue: SCCCI Building, Auditorium, Level 2,
47 Hill Street #09-00, S 179365 (5 mins walk from City Hall MRT Station Exit B)
Bhava Spandana Program
 

Bhava Spandana Program (BSP) is a 4-day, 3-night residential program offered to those who have been initiated into Shambhavi Mahamudra. This advanced meditation program is designed by Sadhguru to provide the opportunity to go beyond the limitations of body and mind and experience higher levels of consciousness. BSP offers the experience of a world of unbounded love and joy.

Gents Program: Sep 10th to 13th
Ladies Program: Sep 15th to 18th

Venue: MBA Long Hua,  Kulai, Johor, Malaysia

Register Here
Isha Yoga Program - 7 Day in Tamil
 

We will be offering the 7-day Isha Yoga Program in Tamil language in Singapore in August. This is a wonderful opportunity for all Tamil speaking people to attend the program and get benefited. Please help us in spreading the word about this to everyone.

Dates: Aug 17th to 23rd
